entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Swift Current
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swift Current Airport 2:56 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Fog. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
